params.connector: The address of the new connector to add

params.oracle: The address of the new oracle to add
params.oracleKind: The type of the new oracle

returns.allConnectors: An array of all registered connectors

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

params.connector: The address of the connector to remove

params.oracle: The address of the oracle to remove
params.oracleKind: The type of the oracle to remove

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions anymore. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby removing any functionality that is only available to the owner.

params._multiWrapper: The address of the MultiWrapper contract

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

addConnector(address).notice: Adds a new connector to the registry.

addOracle(address,uint8).notice: Adds a new oracle to the registry with the given oracle type.

connectors().notice: Returns an array of all registered connectors.

getRate(address,address,bool).notice: WARNING!    Usage of the dex oracle on chain is highly discouraged!    getRate function can be easily manipulated inside transaction!Returns the weighted rate between two tokens using default connectors, with the option to filter out rates below a certain threshold.

getRateToEth(address,bool).notice: WARNING!    Usage of the dex oracle on chain is highly discouraged!    getRate function can be easily manipulated inside transaction!The same as `getRate` but checks against `ETH` and `WETH` only

getRateToEthWithCustomConnectors(address.notice: WARNING!    Usage of the dex oracle on chain is highly discouraged!    getRate function can be easily manipulated inside transaction!The same as `getRateWithCustomConnectors` but checks against `ETH` and `WETH` only

getRateToEthWithThreshold(address,bool,u.notice: WARNING!    Usage of the dex oracle on chain is highly discouraged!    getRate function can be easily manipulated inside transaction!The same as `getRate` but checks against `ETH` and `WETH` only

getRateWithCustomConnectors(address,addr.notice: WARNING!    Usage of the dex oracle on chain is highly discouraged!    getRate function can be easily manipulated inside transaction!Returns the weighted rate between two tokens using custom connectors, with the option to filter out rates below a certain threshold.

getRateWithThreshold(address,address,boo.notice: WARNING!    Usage of the dex oracle on chain is highly discouraged!    getRate function can be easily manipulated inside transaction!Returns the weighted rate between two tokens using default connectors, with the option to filter out rates below a certain threshold.

oracles().notice: Returns all registered oracles along with their corresponding oracle types.

removeConnector(address).notice: Removes a connector from the registry.

removeOracle(address,uint8).notice: Removes an oracle from the registry with the given oracle type.
